item.description:
- The app is secured with JWT. In order to access other endpoints, user may need to have token.
    
- To get their corresponding JWT token, user must request the endpoint `{{baseUrl}}/{{version}}/auth/login` and upon successful authentication, valid token will be provided with the response body.
    
- The token should be added as Header as a 'Bearer ' token for secured endpoints

Adding Employee Functionality is exclusive to Admin Access only.

request from Non-Admin employees will be denied.

item.description:
Updating Employee details is allowed only for ADMIN access.

- userName, Email-ID can be changed.
    
- Status can changed to either ACTIVE / INACTIVE by Admin. Once set INACTIVE - user can't be able to login again unless set ACTIVE back
    
- Role can be changed to USER / MANAGER or ADMIN

item.description:
Employee related functionalities like

- Add Employee,
    
- Update Employee details like mail-Id, username etc.
    
- Setting user Active/Inactive and
    
- retrieve the employee details.
    

Almost all of the Employee specific access are exclusive to Admins.

Admin details can't be retrieved by others like Manager and User Access.

item.description:
- Adding Participant feature is authorised only for Manager access.
    
- Irrespective of different Access, Every project has two different internal roles namely Project Admin and Project Member.
    
- Project Admin has the privelage to delete the ticket related to concerned project
    
- Admin Access employees can't be added in either roles
    
- Only Manager & User access can be added
    
- One employee can be either admin or member or both

item.name: Attachment

response.name: Accessing attachment on non-participating project

item.description:
``` json
"attachments": [
        {
            "id": 8,
            "originalFileName": "sampleDoc-1.pdf",
            "uniqueFileName": "6efb07be-47cf-4daa-9a31-83fe257bc8ba_sampleDoc-1.pdf",
            "downloadUrl": "http://localhost:8080/v1/files/6efb07be-47cf-4daa-9a31-83fe257bc8ba_sampleDoc-1.pdf"
        },
        {
            "id": 14,
            "originalFileName": "2.png",
            "uniqueFileName": "dcb53f35-8f34-4d9b-836f-ecf1ed9a320a_2.png",
            "downloadUrl": "http://localhost:8080/v1/files/dcb53f35-8f34-4d9b-836f-ecf1ed9a320a_2.png"
        }
    ]

 ```

**Description:**

Response for attachments from either Projects or Tickets both will be delivered in this format only.

'downloadUrl' is the endpoint for getting actual attachment downloading.

Client side can make use of this endpoint directly to download links.

This api is secured. Admin have overall access. Managers & Users have access only on participating projects and its tickets attachments.

The 'downloadUrl' portion: '[http://localhost:8080'](http://localhost:8080') will be dynamically changed during runtime based on the environment.
